  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 29

Words 2801-2900

  1. unit
    The book is divided into ten units, each focusing on a different topic.

  2. united
    The team was united in their goal to win the championship.

  3. universe
    The universe is vast and full of mysteries.

  4. university
    She plans to study biology at the university next year.

  5. unknown
    The scientist discovered an unknown species of plant.

  6. unless
    You won’t succeed unless you work hard.

  7. unlike
    Unlike his brother, he prefers quiet evenings at home.

  8. unlikely
    It is unlikely that it will rain today.

  9. unnecessary
    The extra details in the report were unnecessary.

  10. unpleasant
    The smell coming from the kitchen was unpleasant.

  11. until
    We waited until the train arrived.

  12. unusual
    It was unusual to see snow in the middle of summer.

  13. up
    She looked up at the stars in the night sky.

  14. update
    Please update the software to the latest version.

  15. upon
    Upon entering the room, she noticed the beautiful painting.

  16. upper
    The upper floor of the building is used for offices.

  17. upset
    He was upset when he lost his favorite book.

  18. upstairs
    The bedrooms are located upstairs.

  19. upwards
    The balloon floated upwards into the sky.

  20. urban
    Many people prefer urban living for its convenience.

  21. urge
    I urge you to consider all the options before deciding.

  22. us
    The teacher gave us extra homework to complete.

  23. use
    You can use this tool to fix the broken chair.

  24. used1
    She is used to waking up early every morning.

  25. used2
    This car is used but still in good condition.

  26. used
    He used a pencil to write his notes.

  27. useful
    This guide is very useful for beginners.

  28. user
    The app is designed to be user-friendly.

  29. usual
    It is usual for him to take a walk after dinner.

  30. usually
    She usually drinks coffee in the morning.

  31. vacation
    They are planning a vacation to the mountains.

  32. valley
    The river flows through the valley between the hills.

  33. valuable
    This necklace is very valuable to her.

  34. value
    The value of the painting has increased over time.

  35. van
    The delivery van arrived early in the morning.

  36. variety
    The store offers a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.

  37. various
    The museum displays various types of art.

  38. vary
    The prices of the products vary depending on the size.

  39. vast
    The desert is a vast and empty space.

  40. vegetable
    Carrots are her favorite vegetable.

  41. vehicle
    The vehicle stopped suddenly at the red light.

  42. venue
    The concert will take place at a large venue downtown.

  43. version
    The latest version of the app includes new features.

  44. very
    She is very happy with her new job.

  45. via
    We traveled to the city via train.

  46. victim
    The victim of the accident was taken to the hospital.

  47. victory
    The team celebrated their victory after the match.

  48. video
    She watched a video about cooking on her phone.

  49. view
    The view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.

  50. viewer
    The show attracted millions of viewers worldwide.

  51. village
    The small village is surrounded by beautiful hills.

  52. violence
    The movie contains scenes of violence and is not suitable for children.

  53. violent
    The storm was violent and caused a lot of damage.

  54. virtual
    The students attended a virtual class from their homes.

  55. virus
    The computer was infected with a dangerous virus.

  56. vision
    Her vision for the future is full of hope and ambition.

  57. visit
    We plan to visit the museum this weekend.

  58. visitor
    The visitor left a positive review about the hotel.

  59. visual
    The presentation included many visual aids to explain the topic.

  60. vital
    Water is vital for all forms of life.

  61. vitamin
    Oranges are a good source of vitamin C.

  62. voice
    Her voice was calm and soothing.

  63. volume
    Please turn down the volume of the music.

  64. volunteer
    She decided to volunteer at the local animal shelter.

  65. vote
    Everyone has the right to vote in the election.

  66. wage
    The workers demanded a fair wage for their labor.

  67. wait
    We had to wait for an hour before the bus arrived.

  68. waiter
    The waiter brought our food quickly.

  69. wake
    I usually wake up at 7 a.m. every day.

  70. walk
    They decided to take a walk in the park.

  71. wall
    The picture was hanging on the wall in the living room.

  72. want
    I want to learn how to play the guitar.

  73. war
    The war lasted for several years and caused much suffering.

  74. warm
    The sun felt warm on her skin.

  75. warn
    He tried to warn her about the dangers of the road.

  76. warning
    The sign gave a clear warning about the slippery floor.

  77. wash
    Please wash your hands before eating.

  78. washing
    The washing machine is broken and needs to be repaired.

  79. waste
    Don’t waste water while brushing your teeth.

  80. watch
    She likes to watch movies in her free time.

  81. water
    The plants need water to grow.

  82. wave
    She gave a friendly wave as she left the room.

  83. way
    Can you show me the way to the nearest bus stop?

  84. we
    We are planning a trip to the beach this weekend.

  85. weak
    After the illness, he felt weak and tired.

  86. weakness
    Her greatest weakness is her inability to say no.

  87. wealth
    The family gained their wealth through hard work.

  88. wealthy
    The wealthy businessman donated generously to charity.

  89. weapon
    The police found a weapon at the crime scene.

  90. wear
    She likes to wear comfortable clothes at home.

  91. weather
    The weather is perfect for a picnic today.

  92. web
    The spider spun a web in the corner of the room.

  93. website
    The company launched a new website to promote their products.

  94. wedding
    The wedding ceremony was beautiful and emotional.

  95. Wednesday
    The meeting is scheduled for next Wednesday.

  96. week
    She plans to finish the project by the end of the week.

  97. weekend
    They spent the weekend relaxing at the beach.

  98. weigh
    Please weigh the fruit before putting it in the bag.

  99. weight
    He is trying to lose weight by exercising regularly.

  100. welcome
    They gave us a warm welcome when we arrived at their home.
